t: Diddy Reportedly Loses 18 Brand Partnerships Amid Assault Allegations
s: December 11, 2023 - Diddy reportedly lost business partnerships amid multiple sexual assault allegations. A Rolling Stone report detailed that 18 brands ended their partnerships with the mogul’s Empower Global project. Empower Global is an e-commerce platform that focuses on uplifting Black-owned companies.
